name: Bioloxys
description:
A NES flavoured cyberpunk adventure

This short prototype is a test for game action mechanincs for a project under development.

The game will be a action/investigative RPG which take place in a dystopic cyberpunk future. More details will come with the development.

Thanks for playing!

- Controls - 

- LEFT/RIGHT : walk

- UP : hide

- CTRL: roll

- C: shoot

- ENTER or Z: interact

- ESC: menu

* You can change controls in the menu and you can play with joystick
